flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $4 x 100 = <<4*100=400>>400
He has 10 months to earn this money because 12 - 4 = <<12-4=10>>10
He needs to earn $40.0 a month because 400 / 10 = <<400/10=40.0>>40.0
He needs to do 4.0 tasks a month because 40.0 / 10 = <<40.0/10=4.0>>4.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
